Softsign activation function.

@description
It is defined as `f(x) = x / (abs(x) + 1)`.

# Examples
```{r}
x <- k_convert_to_tensor(c(-0.100, -10.0, 1.0, 0.0, 100.0))
k_softsign(x)
```
```{r}
x <- seq(-10, 10, .1)
plot(x, k_softsign(x), ylim = c(-1, 1))
```

@returns
A tensor with the same shape as `x`.

@param x Input tensor.

@export
@family ops
